tasks.label: Tailwind watch
tasks.detail: Compilar estilos CSS y observar cambios.

tasks.label: PargoCode
tasks.detail: Generación de código mediante interfaz web.

tasks.label: Instalar
tasks.command: CGO_ENABLED=0 go install -ldflags "-X main.BUILD_INFO=pargocode:$(date '+%Y-%m-%d%n'):$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) -X main.AMBIENTE=PROD" ./pargocode && echo '[✔] App instalada'

tasks.label: Install gkfmt
tasks.command: CGO_ENABLED=0 go install -ldflags "-X main.BUILD_INFO=gkfmt:$(date '+%Y-%m-%d%n'):$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" ./gkfmt && echo 'Instalado ºuº)/'

tasks.label: Try gkfmt
tasks.command: CGO_ENABLED=0 go run -ldflags "-X main.BUILD_INFO=gkfmt:$(date '+%Y-%m-%d%n'):$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" ./gkfmt -i gkfmt/input.html -o gkfmt/output.html

tasks.label: Debug gkfmt
tasks.command: CGO_ENABLED=0 go run -ldflags "-X main.BUILD_INFO=gkfmt:$(date '+%Y-%m-%d%n'):$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" ./gkfmt -i gkfmt/input.html -o gkfmt/output.html -d 2>&1 | grep --color=always -B 6 -A 6 '${input:debugSearch}'
